channel.title: How come no one can connect to my server
channel.description:
I have tried like 10 servers me and my host but when i run the server he cant login and when he runs it i cant login but he can can some1 plz help me. for some reason the only person who can connect to my server is the person who is running it. can some1 plz add my msn or message me on here. i need help bad.
AT first people could login but now people cant for some odd reason

item.title: How come no one can connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @x1_f4t3_1x x1 f4t3 1x
item.description:
@x1_f4t3_1x wrote:

port forward, if you cant, use uTorrent

Read full topic

item.title: How come no one can connect to my server

item.description:

You need to follow the portfowarding tutorial and the no-ip tutorial and all that shizz on the hosts computer.

item.title: How come no one can connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @jake_93 jake_93
item.description:
@jake_93 wrote:

If your not hosting the server then you don’t need your ports open.

ok thank you i will try that[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 22, 2009, 09:13:19 pm[/size][hr]well i tried it and it says “Your port is now open” ill wait till my host logs in msn to try it out =/

item.title: How come no one can connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @jake_93 jake_93
item.description:
@jake_93 wrote:

Gosh, people need a straight answer not other going on and on…

I’m not 100% sure of your problem but at this point you should go to portfoward and download there portchecker to see if your port is open properly.
Do that and then get back to us.

Thankyou,
Jake

p.s Sorry if other 2 replys befour me helped (posted while i was writing)

Read full topic

item.title: How come no one can connect to my server
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Unless you’re using Hamachi, you must port forward.
